revised_title: Golconda Diamond Mines: Processes and Locations
tldr: The author provides an account of the diamond mines in Golconda, India, and the processes used to extract diamonds. The diamonds are found in rolled pebbles and gravel, which are washed in small reservoirs during dry weather. The text also describes the mines of Banaganpully, Munimudgoo, Condapilly, Sumbhulpoor, and Poonah in Bundlekund.
